---
title: "Library Search Results"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
output: html_document
params:
  ww: NA
---







```{r fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE,}
y <- rbind(c(1,1,1,2,2), c(1,1,1,NA,NA), c(3,3,3,3,3))

for(i in seq_along(ww)){
q <- gridExtra::tableGrob(params$ww[[i]][[3]])
gridExtra::grid.arrange(params$ww[[i]][[1]], params$ww[[i]][[2]], q, layout_matrix = y)
}

```
